backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality yet.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining design tokens for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the JobBiz Portal application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, registration, jobs, business directory, profile, and wrapping with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, Internet Identity login/logout, mobile sheet menu, and user dropdown menu for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component rendering Header, main content area with Outlet for route content, and Footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hooks for user profile, jobs, and businesses data fetching, awaiting backend implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining blue/purple primary colors and teal accents for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point rendering the App component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddBusinessPage.tsx: Page for adding a business listing to the directory, requiring Internet Identity authentication and collecting business details (name, category, description, contact info, location) via a form.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessDirectoryPage: Displays a searchable directory of businesses with mock data, showing business cards with category, description, phone, and location, plus a button to add new businesses.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeRegistrationP: Employee registration form requiring Internet Identity login, collecting personal and professional information (name, contact, experience, skills, education) with a registration fee notice.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerRegistrationP: Employer registration form requiring Internet Identity login, collecting company information (name, industry, size, website, description, contact details) with a registration fee notice.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and features overview, promoting the dual job portal and business directory platform with call-to-action buttons for authenticated and unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/JobsPage.tsx: Job listings page component that displays mock job data in cards with search/filter functionality by title, company, or location.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page that displays Internet Identity principal ID, account status, and provides navigation to employer/employee registration forms with logout functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, custom fonts (Inter, Poppins), animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a combined job portal and business directory application with Internet Identity authentication, Stripe payments, and unique ID generation for users.
